text: The 2020–21 season is the 48th season in the existence of Paris Saint-Germain F.C. == Players == === Squad information === Players and squad numbers last updated on 2 December 2020. Appearances include all competitions. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules. Players may hold more than one non-FIFA nationality. stage ==== The group stage draw was held on 1 October 2020. ==== Knockout phase ==== ===== Round of 16 ===== The draw for the round of 16 was held on 14 December 2020. =====Quarter-finals===== The draw for the quarter-finals was held on 19 March 2021. ===== Semi-finals ===== The draw for the semi-finals was held on 19 March 2021, after the quarter-final draw. == Statistics == ===Appearances and
